snippet: "The Pauly D Project" will chronicle Mr. Delvecchio's endeavors in the music industry as he signs a recording contract with G-Note Records, the label of 50 Cent; travels with Britney Spears on an international tour; and hangs out with his own crew of...
abstract: "The Pauly D Project" will chronicle Mr. Delvecchio's endeavors in the music industry as he signs a recording contract with G-Note Records, the label of 50 Cent; travels with Britney Spears on an international tour; and hangs out with his own crew of distinctively nicknamed pals, including Michael Morgan (a.k.a. "Biggie"), Gerard Gialanella ("Big Jerry"), Jason Craig ("JROC") and Ryan Labbe (no nickname yet).

headline.main: 'Jersey Shore' Spinoff With Pauly D is First to Land at MTV
headline.print_headline: MTV and ‘Jersey Shore’ Have Their First Offspring, and It’s a Boy
